media:group.media:title: [Quest Guide] Temple of the eye
media:group.media:description:
items needed:  bucket of water

recommended: 10 empty inventory slots and weight reducing clothing

Teleports:
- 1 SE Varrock [chronicle]
- 1 North of Al Kharid
- 1 after quest completion

0:00 Intro
0:55 Start
3:21 Abyss
5:29 Wizard's tower
8:46 Temple of the eye
10:42 Minigame tutorial

1) Talk to Persten 2 1
2) Teleport to the mage of Zamorak in SE Varrock  1 3
3) Talk to the tea seller just north 3, tea cannot be obtained before talking to the mage
4) Use the tea on the Mage of Zamorak  1
5) Use the amulet on the dark mage

We must now make every runic energy turn white by touching it, but the order they must touched in, is random for everyone. Letâ€™s brute force our way through this puzzle.
Touch every energy until one lights up touch another one  if both did not turn white; touch the first one again and try another one do this until all 6 are touched in the correct order.

6) Talk to the Dark mage
7) Teleport to the quest start point and talk to Persten 1   drop bucket
8) Talk to Sedridor in the basement  2 4
9) Go up to the middle floor and talk to Traiborn 2
10) Talk to every apprentice in this room to view there riddle parts (this cannot be skipped)
11) Talk to Traiborn  2 11
11) Talk to Sedridor in the basement  1 cutscene

12) Talk to Felix next to you
13) Talk to Tamara west
14) Talk to Cordelia
15) Talk to Persten in the centre  cutscene (talking to apprentices cannot be skipped)

16) Just south, pick up the pickaxe and chisel
17) Follow the arrows to complete the tutorial of this minigame
Once you are done after 5 minutes of following pointing arrows,1 QP  5k RC +1800  Access to the temple of the eye  a medium pouch

Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest
